Articles.Content:
Hi all!

My KSP (0.90) seems to crash far more often than it should. Crashes usually occur when I load a quicksave, change from vab to launch, revert back to vab (same for SPH) and when I recover vessels or return to the space center. My ksp is running on a 2013 iMac with 8 gb of RAM, and uses 2.1 gb ram on average. I have tried active texture management, and have firespitter, hooliganlabs, toolbar, mechjeb, and a couple other utility mods. It doesn't seem to be a RAM issue, but I don't know what else it could be. Any help would be great.
You might try looking at the KSP.LOG logfile, immediately after a crash. Also, try reading over the Support sticky.
